cmp: 氐 (name of an ancient tribe, foundation/on the whole)
mng: to press against, to support, to prop up, to resist, to equal, to balance, to make up for, to mortgage, to arrive at, to clap (one's hands) lightly (expressing delight) (Taiwan pr. [zhi3] for this sense)
